sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const initialState = { name: '', lastname: '', email: '', cellphone: '', company: '', position: '', requirement: '', channel: '', message: '' } export const Contact = (props) => { const [{ name, lastname, email, cellphone, company, position, requirement, channel, message }, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } const clearState = () => setState({ ...initialState }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(name, lastname, email, cellphone, company, position, requirement, channel, message) emailjs .sendForm( 'gmail', 'gmail_template', e.target, 'user_zdWYM85ci04bpRK6IFnrF' ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text) clearState() }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

Get In Touch

Your information and context will help us to clarify what your need is. We will then identify the best way to become your strategic ally and transform the way you make your decisions.

{/* Conctact Information */}

Contact Information

Address {props.data ? props.data.address : 'loading'}

Phone {' '} {props.data ? props.data.phone : 'loading'}

Email {' '} {props.data ? props.data.email : 'loading'}

© 2021 BloY. All Rights Reserved.

) }
